structure.unit: COUNTY ROAD ENGINEER AND MAINTENANCE OF PUBLIC ROADS

law.catch_line: Poles and wires not to obstruct roads.
law.text: Telephone, telegraph, electric railway or other electrical companies shall remove and reset poles and wires when they obstruct the use of public roads.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4340.
